uniform_sql.sqlstring: select IDDOC, IDCABSTR, IDCABNUM, FALBARAN, IDBULTO, LARGO, ANCHO, ALTO, PESOCONT, IDARTIF, DESCRIP, CANTOT, PESO, PESO_TOTAL, PESO_TOTAL_NETO, NOM, "ADREÇA1" as "A1", "ADREÇA2" as "A2", "ADREÇA3" as "A3", (LARGO * ANCHO * ALTO) / 1000000 as "Volumen" from SGAVPACKINGLIST where IDDOC = $(ParamIddoc)

select IDUBI, DESCUBI, PASILLO, COLUMNA, NIVEL, LADO, DESCTIPUBI, DESCTIPALM, ROTACION, DESCESTADO, POSICION, DESCESTADOPOS, DESCACCESOPOS, IDMAC, NUMPOS, IDTIPMAC, IDTIPALM from sgavubicacion where accesopos = 'I'

uniform_sql.column: SGAVPACKINGLIST.LARGO || ' x ' || SGAVPACKINGLIST.ANCHO || ' x ' || SGAVPACKINGLIST.ALTO Medidas
uniform_sql.sqlstring: select SGAVPACKINGLIST.IDDOC, SGAVPACKINGLIST.IDCABSTR as "Nota", SGAVPACKINGLIST.IDCABNUM, SGAVPACKINGLIST.NALBARAN, SGAVPACKINGLIST.NOMBRE, SGAVPACKINGLIST.CCLIENTE, SGAVPACKINGLIST.FALBARAN as "Fecha", SGAVPACKINGLIST.IDBULTO, SGAVPACKINGLIST.LARGO || ' x ' || SGAVPACKINGLIST.ANCHO || ' x ' || SGAVPACKINGLIST.ALTO as "Medidas", SGAVPACKINGLIST.LARGO * SGAVPACKINGLIST.ANCHO * SGAVPACKINGLIST.ALTO / 1000 as "Volúmen ", SGAVPACKINGLIST.PESOCONT, SGAVPACKINGLIST.PESO_TOTAL as "Peso Total", SGAVPACKINGLIST.IDARTIF as "Referencia", SGAVPACKINGLIST.DESCRIP as "Descripción", SGAVPACKINGLIST.CANTOT as "Cantidad", SGAVPACKINGLIST.PESO as "Peso", SGAVPACKINGLIST.NOM, SGAVPACKINGLIST.A1 as "A1", SGAVPACKINGLIST.A2 as "A2", SGAVPACKINGLIST.A3 as "A3" from P_SGAVPACKINGLIST SGAVPACKINGLIST where SGAVPACKINGLIST.IDDOC = $(ParamIddoc)

select SGAVPACKINGLIST.IDDOC, SGAVPACKINGLIST.IDCABSTR, SGAVPACKINGLIST.IDCABNUM, SGAVPACKINGLIST.FALBARAN, SGAVPACKINGLIST.IDBULTO, SGAVPACKINGLIST.LARGO, SGAVPACKINGLIST.ANCHO, SGAVPACKINGLIST.ALTO, SGAVPACKINGLIST.PESOCONT, SGAVPACKINGLIST.IDARTIF, SGAVPACKINGLIST.MOTIVO, SGAVPACKINGLIST.DESCRIP, SGAVPACKINGLIST.CANTOT, SGAVPACKINGLIST.PESO, SGAVPACKINGLIST.PESO_TOTAL, SGAVPACKINGLIST.PESO_TOTAL_NETO, SGAVPACKINGLIST.NOM, SGAVPACKINGLIST.ADREÇA1 as "A1", SGAVPACKINGLIST.ADREÇA2 as "A2", SGAVPACKINGLIST.ADREÇA3 as "A3", SGAVPACKINGLIST.LARGO * SGAVPACKINGLIST.ANCHO * SGAVPACKINGLIST.ALTO / 1000000 as "Volumen" from SGAVPACKINGLIST where SGAVPACKINGLIST.IDDOC = $(ParamIddoc)

table.alias: select distinct (idbulto), peso_total, (largo*ancho*alto)/1000000 as volumen, iddoc from sgavpackinglist
table.name: select distinct (idbulto), sgavpackinglist.PESO_TOTAL, (largo*ancho*alto)/1000000 as volumen, sgavpackinglist.IDDOC from SGAVPACKINGLIST sgavpackinglist

uniform_sql.column:
select distinct (idbulto), peso_total, (largo*ancho*alto)/1000000 as volumen, iddoc from sgavpackinglist .IDDOC
double select distinct (idbulto), peso_total, (largo*ancho*alto)/1000000 as volumen, iddoc from sgavpackinglist

expression1.expression: select distinct (idbulto), peso_total, (largo*ancho*alto)/1000000 as volumen, iddoc from sgavpackinglist .IDDOC

groupby.field: select distinct (idbulto), peso_total, (largo*ancho*alto)/1000000 as volumen, iddoc from sgavpackinglist .IDDOC

uniform_sql.sqlstring: select sum(peso_total) PesTotal, sum("volumen") Volumen, iddoc from (select distinct(idbulto), peso_total, (largo*ancho*alto)/1000000 "volumen", iddoc from sgavpackinglist) where iddoc = $(ParamIddoc) group by iddoc

select IDEXPED, IDCABSTR, IDCABNUM, FALBARAN, IDBULTO, LARGO, ANCHO, ALTO, PESOCONT, IDARTIF, DESCRIP, CANTOT, PESO, PESO_TOTAL, PESO_TOTAL_NETO, NOM, "ADREÇA1" as "A1", "ADREÇA2" as "A2", "ADREÇA3" as "A3", (LARGO * ANCHO * ALTO) / 1000000 as "Volumen", BULTO, ALBORI from SGAVPACKINGLISTEXP where IDEXPED = $(ParamIdexped)

table.alias: select distinct (idbulto), peso_total, (largo*ancho*alto)/1000000 as volumen, idexped from sgavpackinglistexp
table.name: select distinct (idbulto), peso_total, (largo*ancho*alto)/1000000 as volumen, idexped from sgavpackinglistexp

uniform_sql.sqlstring: select sum(peso_total) PesTotal, sum(volumen) Volumen, idexped from (select distinct(idbulto), peso_total, (largo*ancho*alto)/1000000 volumen, idexped from sgavpackinglistexp) where idexped = $(ParamIdexped) group by idexped

select SGAVMOVSUSUARIRESUM.OPERARI, SGAVMOVSUSUARIRESUM.DATA, SGAVMOVSUSUARIRESUM.QUART, decode(substr(SGAVMOVSUSUARIRESUM.ORIDES, 1, 7),'Picking', substr(sgavmovsusuariresum.orides, 11), 'Puesto ', substr(sgavmovsusuariresum.orides, 8), sgavmovsusuariresum.orides) as "ORIGEN/DESTI", sum(SGAVMOVSUSUARIRESUM.MOVIMENTS) as MOVIMENTS, sum(SGAVMOVSUSUARIRESUM.ENTRADES) AS ENTRADES, sum(SGAVMOVSUSUARIRESUM.SORTIDES) AS SORTIDES, sum(SGAVMOVSUSUARIRESUM.REGULAR) AS REGULAR from SGAVMOVSUSUARIRESUM group by sgavmovsusuariresum.operari, sgavmovsusuariresum.data, sgavmovsusuariresum.quart, decode(substr(SGAVMOVSUSUARIRESUM.ORIDES, 1, 7),'Picking', substr(sgavmovsusuariresum.orides, 11), 'Puesto ', substr(sgavmovsusuariresum.orides, 8), sgavmovsusuariresum.orides)

select SGAHISTAVERIA.IDTRASLO as "TRASLO", SGAHISTAVERIA.CREATEDON as "DATA", SGAHISTAVERIA.TEMPS as "DURACIÓ", SGAHISTAVERIA.ESTADO as "ESTAT", SGAHISTAVERIA.UBIORI as "UBI.ORIGEN", SGAHISTAVERIA.UBIDES as "UBI.DESTÍ", SGAHISTAVERIA.IDORD as "ORDRE", SGAHISTAVERIA.PASILLOACTUAL as "PAS.ORIGEN", SGAHISTAVERIA.PASILLODESTINO as "PAS.DESTÍ", SGAHISTAVERIA.POSUBIORI as "POS.UBI.ORIGEN", SGAHISTAVERIA.POSUBIDES as "POS.UBI.DESTÍ", 'TRASLO '||SGAHISTAVERIA.IDTRASLO AS "DESCTRASLO", DECODE(SGAHISTAVERIA.ESTADO, 'A', 'AVERIA', 'FUNCIONAMENT') as "DESCESTAT" from SGAHISTAVERIA

select idtraslo, operacio, passadis, costat, profunditat, alcada, posubi, picking, fecfin, temps, estado from (select t.idtrasloini idtraslo, 'Extracció' operacio, u.pasillo passadis, u.lado costat, u.columna profunditat, u.nivel alcada, t.posubiori posubi, udes.descrip picking, t.fecfin fecfin, round((t.fecfin - t.createdon) * 60 * 24,2) temps, t.estado from sgahistordtran t, sgaubicacion u, sgaubicacion udes where t.ubiori = u.idubi and udes.idubi = t.ubidesfin and u.pasillo in (1, 2, 3, 4) and t.idtrasloini != 0 union select t.idtraslofin, 'Depósit', u.pasillo passadis, u.lado costat, u.columna profunditat, u.nivel alcada, t.posubidesfin, uori.descrip, t.fecfin, round((t.fecfin - t.createdon) * 60 * 24,2) temps, t.estado from sgahistordtran t, sgaubicacion u, sgaubicacion uori where t.ubidesfin = u.idubi and uori.idubi = t.ubiori and u.pasillo in (1, 2, 3, 4) and t.idtraslofin != 0) order by idtraslo,fecfin asc

select a.idartif article, a.descrip descripcio, m.idmac contenidor, u.pasillo passadis, u.lado costat, u.columna profunditat, u.nivel alcada, e.cantot cantot from sgaexistencia e, sgaarticulo a, sgamac m, sgaubicacion u where e.idart = a.idart and e.idmac = m.idmac and u.idubi = m.ubipos and a.idtipmac != 'CUB' and a.idart in (select idart from sgaexistencia having count(*) >2 group by idart) order by idartif, u.pasillo

select SGAVMOVSUSUARIRESUM.OPERARI, SGAVMOVSUSUARIRESUM.DATA, substr(SGAVMOVSUSUARIRESUM.ORIDES, 11) as "ORIGEN/DESTI", sum(SGAVMOVSUSUARIRESUM.MOVIMENTS) as "MOVIMENTS", SUM(SGAVMOVSUSUARIRESUM.ENTRADES) as "ENTRADES", SUM(SGAVMOVSUSUARIRESUM.SORTIDES) as "SORTIDES", SUM(SGAVMOVSUSUARIRESUM.REGULAR) as "REGULAR" from SGAVMOVSUSUARIRESUM group by SGAVMOVSUSUARIRESUM.OPERARI, SGAVMOVSUSUARIRESUM.DATA, substr(SGAVMOVSUSUARIRESUM.ORIDES, 11)
select 'Lliure' Estat, poslibre Total from sgavestadomld union select 'Ocupats', posocup from sgavestadomld union select 'Reservats', posres from sgavestadomld
select posicions, poslibre, poslibrenomes1, posocup, posres, pocupacio, cubvacpos1, cubvacpos2lluire, cubvacpos2tapat from sgavestadomld
